sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Cart.css'; const Cart = ({ cart, total, onClose, onRemove, onUpdateQuantity, onCheckout }) => { return ( <>

Your Order

{cart.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

) : ( cart.map(item => (
{item.image}

{item.name}

{(item.price * item.quantity)}k

{item.quantity}
)) )}
{cart.length > 0 && (
Total: {total}k
)}
); }; export default Cart;
